title: Could you please tell me what font this is?
content:
Could someone please tell me which font this is? - just the condensed sans serif in the black banner.

all best,  
L

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Vintage-Black-White-Dental-Posters-Exdontia-Sponges.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414220136/http:/typophile.com/files/Vintage-Black-White-Dental-Posters-Exdontia-Sponges.jpg) | 273.63 KB |
author: LúkasRóbertsson

comments.content: P.S. I think it might be Trade Gothic? does this sound right? - if this is the case, could someone recommend a free alternative?

Font Squirrel's Bebas or Bebas Neue [http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/bebas-neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414220136/http:/www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/bebas-neue "http://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/bebas-neue"), other than the G cause it doesnt have a barb, also Haettenschweiler could be a good alternative
